players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie was a great guy, and I'm sad to see him go. We need to figure out who did this."
Bob: "I'm sorry to hear that Charlie is gone. As the mafioso, I acted in self-defense. The truth will come out eventually."
You: "I don't think Bob is telling the truth. He's acting suspiciously."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
